Detailed Description

template<typename EnumType, EnumType EnumVal, typename IType = double>
class rev::Quantity_impl< EnumType, EnumVal, IType >

The implementation of the Quantity class, to be encapsulated by the Quantity class itself.

This internal class exists to to enforce the Enum class type
